answers.answer: hi there.well fatigue and frequent urination is always stmptons that need checking in case of diabetes, as for a lump in the wrist its a really common place for ganglion its a benign cyst harmless but sometimes if it gets too big or painful surgery is needed'best wishesdeb
You need to see your GP ASAP ...... you could have a blood disorder.....which comes with easily bruising... and esp Fatigue....Maybe even Diabetes..... ? Go get yourself checked out . Best of luck!

question: Been having bruising for a while, it had stopped but returned and now I keep,getting this lump to the side of my wrist and very fatigue at times and recently been having frequent urination. Any idea of what might be causing this?
title: Different symptoms that I'm not sure if it might be something serious...
